# Thanksgiving Message Website

This is a Next.js application with TypeScript for a Thanksgiving message website featuring:
- Public homepage displaying approved messages
- Message submission modal using Ant Design
- Admin approval system
- MongoDB with Mongoose for data persistence

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Ant Design for UI components
- MongoDB with Mongoose
- Tailwind CSS for styling

## Key Features
- Message submission with approval workflow
- Admin panel for message moderation
- Responsive design with Thanksgiving theme
- API routes for CRUD operations

Please follow the existing patterns and maintain consistency with the Thanksgiving color scheme and Ant Design components.
